column2: ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE NEUTRALIZED THE WMD SITE. I REPEAT WMD SITE NEUTRALIZED. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. WE JUST ARRIVED TO THE BRIDGE. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR FAST ROPING. LOWER YOUR GOGGLES. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GOOD LUCK BOYS, GIVE 'EM HELL. WE ARE HEADING HOME. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER THAT. GREAT NEWS. PAPA BEAR OUT.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. ROGER THAT. JOB WELL DONE. MISSION ACCOMPLISHED. OVER.
